channel.title: work on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: I'm syndicated
item.description: Someone at work thought it would be a good idea to give me access to the corporate blog so that I might post PostgreSQL-related things there and have them syndicated to Planet PostgreSQL.

item.title: Glutton for Punishment
item.description: I recently got a new Macbook Pro from work as my old one was having keyboard issues and since it was 3+ yrs old they deemed it not worth fixing.
